name: Elements For Money
description:
Cause reactions, discover new elements, and gain gold for your efforts in Elements For Money!

Every turn, you can move your elements around and get a new one from the shop. Adjacent elements can react to form new elements or provide gold bonuses for being next to other elements.

Get enough gold before payment to stay in the game, and obtain a high total gold count to get as high of a rank as you can.
Features
  • 90+ elements to discover!
  • ~1000 reactions to cause!
  • Playable with mouse and/or keyboard (support for both)!
  • A randomized shop for roguelike gameplay!
  • A variety of strategies to get high profit!
  • Gold to gain!
